explains: n. 改革者；十字军战士

sentences.en: Aren't you afraid of being seen as a righteous crusader?
sentences.cn: 难道你不怕被人看成是一个装腔作势的改革者吗？

sentences.en: He has set himself up as a crusader for higher press and broadcasting standards.
sentences.cn: 他成了为取得更高的新闻和广播原则而奋战的斗士。

sentences.en: A crusader leader had promised them protection. He meant it.
sentences.cn: 一名十字军首领曾许诺给予他们保护。
